column5: Have a wonderful Friday 13 you guys. I wish the weather were a lot better.  Will March 13th also be an official Port Dover Friday 13?  The one in November will also be cold.  Have a great time.  carp-starter
I have no idea what this post is about it is early, might have gone over my head
Terry, I hope this helps ----  http://www.pd13.com/  carp-starter
iam not  going, too darm coold for a ride on the hog

A friend of my daughters used to build incredible custom motorcycles and he went to every Friday 13th Port Dover g2g there was. Sheri rode down on the back of his bike a few years ago and said it was a fantastic day and a must see for anybody into bikes.
